objects.description: A JHUHUGIT variant takes screenshots by simulating the user pressing the "Take Screenshot" key (VK_SCREENSHOT), accessing the screenshot saved in the clipboard, and converting it to a JPG image.

external_references.description: Unit 42. (2018, February 28). Unit 42 Playbook Viewer - Sofacy. Retrieved March 15, 2018.

objects.x_mitre_detection: A {{LinkById|S0044}} variant takes screenshots by simulating the user pressing the "Take Screenshot" key (VK_SCREENSHOT), accessing the screenshot saved in the clipboard, and converting it to a JPG image.
